skills.name: Z-Drive Resonance
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Innate:}} {{ci|Ekko|Ekko's}} basic attacks and damaging abilities apply stacks. The third stack deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and, if the target is a {{tip|champion}}, grants {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} to '''Ekko'''.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Resonance:}} '''Ekko's''' [[basic attack]]s and damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply a ''Resonance'' [[stack]] to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks and damaging abilities.

At 3 stacks, ''Resonance'' is consumed to deal {{pp|30 to 80 by 10; 80 to 140|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased by 150% against {{tip|monsters}}, dealing {{pp|30*2.5 to 80*2.5 by 10*2.5; 80*2.5 to 140*2.5|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 200% AP)}}.
''Resonance'' cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.

{{sbc|Innate - Stolen Time:}} Triggering ''Resonance'' against a {{tip|champion}} grants '''Ekko''' {{pp|key=%|50 to 80 for 4|1 to 16|color=movement speed}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{pp|2 to 3 for 3|1 to 11}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Resonance: Ekko's basic attacks and damaging Champion ability apply a Resonance stack to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks and damaging abilities.
At 3 stacks, Resonance is consumed to deal 30undefined − 80 by 10; 80undefined (based on level) (+ 80% AP) bonus magic damage, increased by 150% against monsters, dealing 30*2.5undefined − 80*2.5 by 10*2.5; 80*2.5undefined (based on level) (+ 200% AP).
Resonance cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.
Innate - Stolen Time: Triggering Resonance against a champion grants Ekko 1 to 16 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed for 1 to 11 ‒ undefined seconds.
skills.notes:
* '''Ekko's''' basic attacks have different animations based on how many stacks his target has. His attack pattern is as follows: 
** {{tt|Downwards|first stack}} → {{tt|Upwards|second stack}} → {{tt|Sideways|third stack to consume all stacks}}
*** If the target has already been affected by ''Resonance'', '''Ekko's''' basic attack animations will kick or attack the target sideways.
* ''Resonance'' stacks will not be applied nor consumed if the basic attack is {{tip|blocked}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Z-Drive Resonance's'' application via basic attacks interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

skills.name: Timewinder
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Ekko}} throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. It expands at max range or upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit.
After a delay, the grenade returns back to Ekko, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' throws a temporal grenade in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies along its path.

After traveling 700 units or upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}, the grenade slows down for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, expanding and creating a ''Temporal Sickness'' field that {{tip|slow|slows}} nearby enemies, while continuing to travel in its direction for another 190 units and expanding for another 50 units.
After finishing its path, the grenade contracts and returns to '''Ekko''' at a higher speed, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies along its path.
''The traveling and returning pass each cannot affect the same enemy more than once.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies along its path.
After traveling 700 units or upon hitting an enemy champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds, expanding and creating a Temporal Sickness field that slows nearby enemies, while continuing to travel in its direction for another 190 units and expanding for another 50 units.
After finishing its path, the grenade contracts and returns to Ekko at a higher speed, dealing magic damage to enemies along its path.
The traveling and returning pass each cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
leveling: {{st|Returning Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 140}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|60+40 to 120+140}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
skills.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only a single instance of damage.

effects.str: • Outward Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

• Returning Magic Damage: (+ 60% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 90% AP)

skills.name: Parallel Convergence
skills.blurb:
{{cis|Ekko}} basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to a {{as|low-health}} target, increased based on the {{as|target's '''missing''' health}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Ekko}} indicates the target location which, after a delay, he creates a field that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies hit.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Ekko's''' basic attacks deal {{as|3% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''missing''' health|health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to targets below {{sti|health|{{as|30% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' calls upon an afterimage that bats a device to the target location. After traveling over 3 seconds, the device expands to {{tip|slow}} enemies within the area by 40%, only revealing itself to enemies in the last second.

If '''Ekko''' enters the expansion within the next {{fd|1.5}} seconds after it lands, it detonates to {{tip|shield}} him for 2 seconds and {{tip|stun}} all enemies within the area for {{fd|2.25}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage to targets below 30% of their maximum health. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against minions and monsters.
Active: Ekko calls upon an afterimage that bats a device to the target location. After traveling over 3 seconds, the device expands to slow enemies within the area by 40%, only revealing itself to enemies in the last second.
If Ekko enters the expansion within the next 1.5 seconds after it lands, it detonates to shield him for 2 seconds and stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.
skills.notes:
* ''Parallel Convergence's'' active provides {{tip|sight}} in its radius 2 seconds after cast and for as long as the {{tip|slow|slowing}} field is active.
* '''Ekko''' can detonate the expansion even while {{tip|untargetable}} (i.e. {{ais|Chronobreak|Ekko}} dash), but not if he is {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}}.
* '''Ekko's''' {{tip|shield}} buff reads ''Seen It All Before'': "'''Ekko''' has already seen this timeline and is able to avoid some incoming damage".
* Enemies affected by the stun receive the debuff ''Temporal Suspension'': "The unit is frozen in time. WARNING: Avoid the detonation radius of temporal anomalies."
* The passive applies {{tip|proc damage}}.

skills.name: Phase Dive
skills.target_range: {{tt|325|Dash distance}} / {{tt|550|Maximum increased dash distance across terrain}}
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Ekko}} {{tip|dash|rolls}} in the target direction, gaining {{sti|range|'''bonus''' attack range}}.
His next {{tip|basic attack}} deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|blink|blinks}} him to the target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, then causes his next [[basic attack]] within 3 seconds to gain {{sti|range|300 '''bonus''' range}}, have a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time, make him {{tip|blink}} within {{tt|125|Estimated}} range of the target, and deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
''Phase Dive'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Ekko's''' basic attack timer.
'''Ekko''' can cast any of his abilities while {{tip|dash|dashing}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ekko dashes in the target direction, then causes his next basic attack within 3 seconds to gain 300 bonus range, have a 0.25-second cast time, make him blink within 125 range of the target, and deal bonus magic damage.
Phase Dive resets Ekko's basic attack timer.
Ekko can cast any of his abilities while dashing.
skills.notes:
* The {{tip|dash}} distance can be extended to up-to 550 units when targeting across terrain. It will only extend for the distance needed to cross the wall.
* If '''Ekko's''' target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, or leaves {{tip|sight}} during the basic attack's cast time, ''Phase Dive's'' attack will cancel but the buff is not consumed.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Ekko''' loses the {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}} from ''Phase Dive''.
* ''Phase Drive's'' attack can be {{tip|blocked}} consuming the basic attack without dealing any damage.
* {{Pending for test}}: Parry interactions ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

skills.name: Chronobreak
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} {{ci|Ekko}} reveals a time-delayed ''afterimage'' of himself that tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' enters {{tip|stasis}} and {{tip|dash|rewinds}} to the ''afterimage'', {{tip|heal|healing}} based on the damage received in the last 4 seconds. He then explodes, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Upon learning ''Chronobreak'' or if its '''current''' cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, '''Ekko''' reveals a time-delayed ''afterimage'' of himself that tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' enters {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} at the start of the cast time, and afterwards {{tip|heal|heals}} himself and {{tip|dash|dashes}} to his ''afterimage's'' current location over {{fd|0.5}} seconds. Upon arrival, he generates an explosion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.
'''''Ekko''' is immune to all {{tip|airborne|displacements}} during Chronobreak''.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Upon learning Chronobreak or if its current cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, Ekko reveals a time-delayed afterimage of himself that tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.
Active: Ekko enters stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards heals himself and dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, he generates an explosion, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.
Ekko is immune to all displacements during Chronobreak.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 450}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}{{st|Self-Heal|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} (increased by 3% ''per {{as|1% of health}} lost in the past 4 seconds'')}}
skills.notes:
* '''Ekko''' will attempt to basic attack the closest target after appearing at the cast location, but can do so quicker if he manually attack commands after the dash, except if {{ai|Phase Dive|Ekko}} is primed.
* The ''afterimage's'' location will explode even if '''Ekko's''' {{tip|dash}} is interrupted.
* The ''afterimage'' is always visible to '''Ekko''' and his allies. To enemies, the ''afterimage'' can only be seen if they {{tip|sight}} of it.
* A ''link'' can also be seen between the ''afterimage'' and '''Ekko''' that traces along his path.
** The ''link'' follows the same visibility rules as the ''afterimage''.
** Upon activation, '''Ekko''' travels full distance through the ''link'', and thus will detonate {{ai|Parallel Convergence|Ekko}} that the ''link'' passes through.
* [[File: Quicksilver Sash item.png|20px|link=]] {{nie|Quicksilver}} is placed on a 1-second {{sti|cooldown}} upon casting ''Chronobreak''.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 150% AP)
  • Self-Heal: (+ 60% AP) (increased by 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds)

st_slices: (+ 60% AP) (increased by 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds)
